channel.title: movement on David D. Hofmann
channel.description: Recent content in movement on David D. Hofmann

item.title: Step Selection Analysis Part 1 - Movement Simulation
item.description: Step selection analysis is a very powerful statistical method that allows to investigate habitat and movement preferences of animals using GPS data. In this first part, we are going to simulate animal movement, also using the step selection framework. We will later analyse this data in part 2 and 3.
